description: Well-differentiated FIGO grade 1 endometrioid adenocarcinoma confined to the endometrium without myometrial or lymphovascular invasion and negative lymph nodes (pT1a N0).
patient_notes: Your report shows a low-grade endometrial cancer confined to the uterine lining with no spread to lymph nodes. No further treatment beyond your surgery is typically necessary. We recommend close monitoring with regular follow-up appointments.

verification.assessment: Staging is accurate: tumor confined to endometrium without myometrial or lymphovascular invasion and negative nodes corresponds to FIGO IA and pT1a N0. Observation aligns with guidelines.
